name: slack_send_message
description: Sends a new message to a specific Slack user or channel.

name: slack_read_messages
description: Reads the last N messages from a specific Slack channel.

name: create_calendar_event
description: Creates a new event in the user's primary Google Calendar.

summary.description: The title of the event, e.g., 'Meeting with Ozan'

start_time.description: Start date and time in ISO RFC3339 format, e.g., '2025-11-06T14:00:00+03:00'

end_time.description: End date and time in ISO RFC3339 format, e.g., '2025-11-06T15:00:00+03:00'
